modName: Red Grey Blue and Green Dwarven Armours and Weapons
summary: Four sets of modified Dwarven textures that will replace every Dwarven items (armours and weapons) for both male and female characters.
descriptionHtml:
Four sets of modified Dwarven textures that will replace every Dwarven items (armours and weapons) for both male and female characters.

NEW FILE available separately (check it out if you like Dwarven Armours):

Steel Dwarven Armour and Weapons
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=373

Weapons and shield are included and it has a different look (the no shiny option is included by default). 

Description
===========

I really like the design of Dwarven armours and weapons but I\'m not too keen on the golden hue they display so I\'ve decided to extract the textures and do a quick retex job. 

This will replace existing textures but you can revert to the original by simply deleting the files.

There are two sets of textures one that is grey and less saturated than the original so it doesn\'t have that golden hue anymore and another one that is more reddish with a slightly different tone. 

You can pick either one or combine them if you want reddish Dwarven weapons with the grey Dwarven armour then all you have to do is copy the armor folder from the Grey file and the weapon folder from the red file. 

The way they look in game may differ depending on the resolution and settings you\'re using. Some mods like custom shaders and stuff will make a difference too. 

This is not a high definition retex. All I did was extract the textures from the BSA archive and apply some minor modifications to the DDS files to get a slighty different look in game. 

Updated with two new sets, blue and green.

Optional file
============

A non shiny option that can be used with any texture set (including vanilla) simply extract in data folder. If you don\'t want this to apply to weapons only copy the armor folder from the mod folder. 

Install
=======

Extract this archive to any folder and then copy the files to the Data folder.

Uninstall
=========

Delete the textures from the data folder.

Compatibility
===============

It should be compatible with most mods that don\'t modify textures for Dwarven gear.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================

None.

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for another great game and thanks to the TESNexus for being so awesome.

===============

Feel free to upload pictures of your characters wearing Dwarven gear if you like the mod. 

Have a nice game! ;)
author: Shantih
